pageIndexChanged.description:
Event fired after the page index is changed , but before grid data rebinds
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.pageIndex to get current page index.

pageIndexChanging.description:
Event fired before the page index is changed.
   Return false in order to cancel page index changing.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.currentPageIndex to get current page index.
   Use ui.newPageIndex to get new page index.

pagerRendered.description:
Event fired after the pager footer is rendered
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.dataSource to get reference to grid's data source.

pagerRendering.description:
Event fired before the pager footer is rendered (the whole area below the grid records).
   Return false in order to cancel pager footer rendering.   
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.dataSource to get reference to grid's data source.

pageSizeChanged.description:
Event fired after the page size is changed from the page size dropdown.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.pageSize to get current page size.

pageSizeChanging.description:
Event fired when the page size is about to be changed from the page size dropdown.
   Return false in order to cancel page size changing.   
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.currentPageSize to get current page size.
   Use ui.newPageSize to get new page size.

currentPageDropDownLeadingLabel.description: leading label for the dropdown from where the page index can be switched

currentPageDropDownTooltip.description: custom localized tooltip for the page index dropdown

currentPageDropDownTrailingLabel.description: localized trailing label for the dropdown from where the page index can be switched

currentPageIndex.description: current page index that's bound and rendered in the UI

defaultDropDownWidth.description: dropdown width for page size and page index dropdowns

delayOnPageChanged.description: Time in milliseconds for which page dropdown will wait for keystrokes before changing the page.

firstPageLabelText.description: localized text for the first page label

firstPageTooltip.description: custom localized tooltip for the first. page button

lastPageLabelText.description: localized text for the last page label

lastPageTooltip.description: custom localized tooltip for the last. page button

nextPageLabelText.description: localized text for the next page label

nextPageTooltip.description: custom localized tooltip for the next. page button

pageCountLimit.description: sets gets the number of pages which if exceeded a drop down list of page indices is displayed. If the number of pages is less than or equal to this option then page buttons are displayed.

pageIndexUrlKey.description: denotes the name of the encoded URL parameter that will state what is the currently requested page index

pagerRecordsLabelTemplate.description: custom pager records label template - in jQuery templating style and syntax

pagerRecordsLabelTooltip.description: custom localized tooltip for the pager records label

pageSize.description: default number of records per page

pageSizeDropDownLabel.description: label rendered in front of the page size dropdown

valueOptions.name: above
valueOptions.description: it will be rendered above the grid header

valueOptions.name: inpager
valueOptions.description: it will be rendered next to page links

pageSizeDropDownTooltip.description: custom localized tooltip for the page size dropdown

pageSizeDropDownTrailingLabel.description: Trailing label for the page size dropdown

pageSizeList.description: Default: [5, 10, 20, 25, 50, 75, 100]. contents of the page size dropdown indicating what preconfigured page sizes are available to the end user

pageSizeUrlKey.description: denotes the name of the encoded URL parameter that will state what is the currently requested page size

pageTooltipFormat.description: custom localized format string for tooltips of buttons that directly jump to a particular page. The format string follows the jQuery templating style and syntax. See also the pageCountLimit option.

prevPageLabelText.description: localized text for the prev page label

prevPageTooltip.description: custom localized tooltip for the prev. page button

recordCountKey.description: the property in the response that will hold the total number of records in the data source

showFirstLastPages.description: option specifying whether to render the first and last page buttons

showPagerRecordsLabel.description: option specifying whether to show summary label for the currently rendered records or not

showPageSizeDropDown.description: if false, a dropdown allowing to change the page size will not be rendered in the UI

showPrevNextPages.description: option specifying whether to render the previous and next page buttons

visiblePageCount.description: number of pages that are constantly visible. For the invisible pages, prev and next buttons are used
